objects.text:
• Premium polarized lenses
• 100% UV protection
• Durable acetate frame
• Iconic rectangular shape

product_details.name: Classic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer - Timeless Style, Premium Protection
product_details.description:
• Authentic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer design in sleek black
• Premium polarized lenses for superior glare reduction
• Durable, high-quality acetate frame construction
• Classic silver Ray-Ban signature branding
• 100% UV protection for optimal eye safety
• Comfortable, lightweight wear for all-day use
• Universal fit with iconic rectangular shape
• Includes genuine Ray-Ban case and cleaning cloth
• Stylish design suitable for all face shapes
• Perfect blend of fashion and functionality

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a sleek dark theme with a radial-circular composition built on a deep navy-blue gradient background. It features elegant layered golden borders that frame the content, providing a premium and high-end visual appeal. At the top left, the bold heading (`heading`) grabs attention in bright white, followed by a secondary subheading (`subheading`) in a rich golden hue. A short golden line (`decorative`) acts as a divider above the compact product description text (`description`). The central focus is the large product image (`product_image`), diagonally aligned for visual interest. Near the bottom, an assertive marketing tagline (`tagline`) sits above a yellow call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with contrasting button text (`cta`). 

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: #1A2742
- Midnight Blue: #2C3E50
- Gold: #D4AF37
- White: #FFFFFF
- Button Text Blue: #1A2742
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of sleek, polarized Ray-Ban sunglasses with a modern and bold aesthetic. Dominated by deep, glossy black tones (#000000) in the frame and temples, the design reflects sophistication. The dark grey polarized lenses (#2F2F2F) offer contrast with a matte, smooth texture. Subtle white accents (#FFFFFF) in the Ray-Ban logo and metallic hinge details create a crisp visual highlight, balancing the overall darkness. These colors are cleanly segmented, yet the reflective surface of the frame blends the blacks and greys naturally. This trio forms a stylish, minimalist palette suited for a premium, high-impact advertisement banner.
